root: ^Gotta wee hunch you're no stranger to small things. And I reckon the ladies know all about it too.
^Only thing smaller around here is yer chances of impressin anyone.
^Shrink it, yeah? Laddie like yerself ought to know about small things.
^So, shrinkin things now, are we? Couldn't be smaller than yer self-respect.
^Ah, shrinkage. Just another reminder of nature's twisted sense of humor.
^Shrinkage? Sounds like yer cock's doin its best turtle impression—only comin out when it’s safe and warm.
^Fuck me, mate, if it gets any smaller, I'm gonna have to call it a clitoris. Or yer cock.
^Only growth I’ve noticed like that is the one in me pants after a few pints.
^Shame that thing can’t help you sprout a pair of balls.
^So, uh, what else can that brew grow bigger? Askin for a friend.
^Save a bit of that muck to sprout yerself a brain.
